DOC.brief_summary: This feasibility study WrapAround Case Management Program Youth Injured Violence . Youth ( age 10-24 ) injure violence visit emergency department offer support worker provide WrapAround Case Management . This study design assess feasibility recruitment , enrollment follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: A WrapAround Case Management Program Youth Injured Violence
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 10 24 2 . Presentation ED trauma floor injury cause violence ( defined injury inflict someone else one gunshot wound , stab wound , injury due blunt object , injury due bodily force ) . 1 . Unable consent due language brain injury , 2 . Sexual assault , 3 . Child Abuse 4 . SelfInflicted Injury , 5 . Subject arrest 6 . Nonresident Winnipeg .
